file_summary: This configuration file primarily defines settings for a Spring Boot application, focusing on database initialization, web UI (Thymeleaf), JPA behavior, internationalization, actuator endpoints, logging, and static resource caching. It configures the application to use an H2 in-memory database and specifies the locations for SQL schema and data scripts to be dynamically loaded based on the selected database type. It disables automatic DDL generation by Hibernate and open-in-view for JPA. Furthermore, it exposes all Spring Boot Actuator endpoints for monitoring and management, sets up the base for internationalization messages, defines the default logging level for Spring components, and specifies a caching duration for static web resources. This file acts as a central hub for tailoring the application's runtime behavior across various layers.

attributes.name: database
attributes.description: Specifies the primary database type to be used, set to H2 in-memory database.

attributes.name: spring.sql.init.schema-locations
attributes.description: Defines the classpath location for SQL schema initialization scripts, dynamically using the 'database' property.

attributes.name: spring.sql.init.data-locations
attributes.description: Defines the classpath location for SQL data initialization scripts, dynamically using the 'database' property.

attributes.name: spring.thymeleaf.mode
attributes.description: Sets the template mode for Thymeleaf, indicating it will process HTML templates.

attributes.name: spring.jpa.hibernate.ddl-auto
attributes.description: Controls Hibernate's DDL generation. Set to 'none' to prevent Hibernate from automatically creating or updating the database schema.

attributes.name: spring.jpa.open-in-view
attributes.description: Controls whether the JPA EntityManager is kept open during the view phase. Set to 'false' to avoid potential performance issues or lazy-loading problems outside of a transaction.

attributes.name: spring.messages.basename
attributes.description: Specifies the base name for the message bundles used for internationalization.

attributes.name: management.endpoints.web.exposure.include
attributes.description: Configures which Spring Boot Actuator web endpoints should be exposed. Set to '*' to expose all available endpoints.

attributes.name: logging.level.org.springframework
attributes.description: Sets the logging level for all Spring framework packages to INFO.

attributes.name: spring.web.resources.cache.cachecontrol.max-age
attributes.description: Defines the maximum age for static resources to be cached by the client or proxy, set to 12 hours.
